message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll offer 70-30. Your turn!
You're getting greedy, Bob! Let's meet in the middle at 55-45.
I'll meet you at 55-45, but I'll take 60. You're getting closer to the original 60-40, but I'm not there yet!
You're getting closer, Bob! I'll meet you at 52-48, but don't think you're getting away with the whole pie!
You're getting closer to 52-48, but I'll take 55. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up yet!
